## CircuitStorage.loadCircuitData() method

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

loads circuit data by id

**Signature:**

```typescript
loadCircuitData(circuitId: CircuitId): Promise<CircuitData>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  circuitId | [CircuitId](./polygonid-js-sdk.circuitid.md) | id of the circuit |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[CircuitData](./polygonid-js-sdk.circuitdata.md)&gt;

`Promise<CircuitData>`
